vehicle.restrictions

Class Restriction

  • java.lang.Object
    • vehicle.restrictions.Restriction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EngineAircoRestriction, MandatoryPartsRestriction, PlatformBodyWheelsRestriction, SportEngineRestriction, SportSpoilerRestriction, SupportedPartsRestriction

    public abstract class Restriction
extends java.lang.Object
    this class represents a setific restriction and a chain to manage all restrictions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Restriction() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkPartialValidity(PartsSet set)
      Checks whether this restriction and successors pass for given set but does not take into account whether all required parts have been selected or not.
      boolean checkValidity(PartsSet set)
      checks whether this constraint and all successors are fulfilled for the given set.
      void setSuccessor(Restriction successor)
      adds the successor to the chain of restrictions
      static Restriction trivialRestriction()
      A trivial restriction that is always fulfilled.
